fungerar ej när man ska mounta cd2... inte med daemon tools v3.47 iaf HJÄLP!!!:(

Efter lite trixande så kom jag på
lösningen på erat problem grabbar!!
Gör så här:

1. Döp om "nli-de6b.cue" till "nli-de6b.txt", alltså byt filändelse!
2. Öppna nu "nli-de6b.txt"
3. Ta bort det som står å byt till:
FILE "nli-de6b.bin" BINARY
  TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
    INDEX 01 00:00:00

4. Spara allt och byt tillbaka till "nli-de6b.cue"

Nu ska allt funka, det gjorde det för mig!

/Milo

About the Dance Ejay 6 crack...you're all trying too hard :D...if you look in the dance ejay 6 directory when you've installed both cd's, don't just stop in that main directory thinking you have to replace the 'Dance6.exe' file...you have to infact go into the 'eJay' dirtecory, and then into the next 'eJay' sub folder, hopefully you'll see that there's a 'Dance60.exe' file there, so just replace that one, and the program will now start up fine
